overview: Check out the entire Super Bowl 50 Halftime Show, starring Coldplay, Beyonce and Bruno Mars, ending with an amazing homage to former Super Bowl Halftime shows.  Setlist included: "Yellow", "Viva La Vida", "Paradise", "Adventure of a Lifetime", "Uptown Funk", "Formation", "Clocks", and "Fix You"/"Up and Up"
title: Coldplay- Superbowl 50 -Halftime Show
